responses.text: What can you tell me about the Xenoids?

dynamic_line: When I was on the evacuation bus I saw a group of these strange looking soldier types that were armed with swords and shields. I almost thought it was some kind of morbid live action role playing during the riots, until one of them looked directly at me.  I swear its eyes pulsed red, and I started having the worst panic attack I've ever had, it was as if the knight turned into a crusading Templar and I was a refugee outside the walls of Jerusalem.  If I hadn't already had an empty stomach I probably would have lost it.  It still haunts me.

responses.text: [RP] Can you tell me more about that hallucination?

dynamic_line: All I can say is that when I saw his eyes pulse red and the whole world around me changed.  The aliens with swords now appeared like armoured knights with a golden cross on the shield.  The strangest thing is that I never really paid attention to history in school, but I knew they were Knights Templar coming to kill us.  Just when they seemed like they were about to strike, I must have came to my senses because I was on the floor of the bus dry heaving.
